mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, num, title, name, contents, createDate, count from (select * from BOARDS where ${skey} like '%'||#{sval}||'%' order by createDate desc) BOARDS) where rn between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from BOARDS where ${skey} like '%'||#{sval}||'%'
mapper.insert: insert into BOARDS(title, name, contents, createDate, count) values(#{title}, #{name}, #{contents}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), 0)
mapper.update: update BOARDS set title=#{title}, name=#{name}, contents=#{contents}, createDate=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where num=#{num}
update BOARDS set count=#{count} where num=#{num}
